subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. handed Nets forward Cliff Robinson a five-game suspension for violating the league's antidrug program, a blow to the team's chances in the second-round playoff series against the Miami Heat.
snippet: The N.B.A. handed Nets forward Cliff Robinson a five-game suspension for violating the league's antidrug program, a blow to the team's chances in the second-round playoff series against the Miami Heat.
